Class Saver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eiei.mycookerynotes.managers.Saver
  • public class Saver
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles the prcess of saving dishes' data to a database

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private static void createDishDir()
      This private method creates a dir for dish data, if it not exists
      static void saveDescriptions​(Dish dish)
      This method saves dish's description.
      static void saveDish​(Dish dish)
      Saves a dish to a database, contains methods of creating a dir for dish data if necessary, saving dish class field values
      private static void saveDishBody​(Dish dish)
      This private method saves a dish's key values in a text form returned by Dish.toString() method.
      private static void saveDishReceipts​(Dish dish)
      This method saves dish's receipts data in a text form with a Receipt.toString().
